title: Super Beach Fronted Property for Sale
details:
This is a fabulous beach fronted property with a wide beach frontage located very close to the Jetwing lagoon.

The property comes with an exclusive 15' roadway from the main road.

Land Extent :- 200 Perches

Quoted Selling Price :- LKR 300,000/- PP

NO BROKERS/AGENTS PLEASE
